preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 12.5 g of Germanium (Ge), 30 g of Scandium (Sc), 80 g of Silicon (Si), 5 g of Thulium (Tm), and 35 g of Yttrium (Y) using an analytical scale. 
 2. In a clean glass or ceramic mixing container, combine all the measured materials thoroughly using a spatula or mixer to ensure homogeneous distribution. 
 3. Transfer the mixed powder into a crucible suitable for high-temperature processing.
